title: How to Make Parmesan Tuna Salad

steps.headline: Drain the tuna and add to a small mixing bowl.
Add the mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, garlic powder,  salt and pepper to the mixing bowl.
Serve tuna salad over a bed of lettuce leaves or use as a sandwich filling.

text: Drain the tuna and add to a small mixing bowl.  Add the mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, garlic powder,  salt and pepper to the mixing bowl.  Mix gently to combine.  Serve tuna salad over a bed of lettuce leaves or use as a sandwich filling.
